statements: SELECT * FROM SupplyChainPayments;
SELECT party_a, party_b, payment_amount FROM SupplyChainPayments WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM SupplyChainPayments WHERE party_a = 'SupplierX';
SELECT party_a, party_b, payment_amount, payment_date FROM SupplyChainPayments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainPayments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC, payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainPayments WHERE payment_status='Pending' ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT party_a, party_b, payment_amount FROM SupplyChainPayments WHERE payment_status='Pending' ORDER BY payment_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainPayments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 AND payment_status='Completed';
SELECT contract_id, payment_date FROM SupplyChainPayments WHERE party_a='Company X' AND party_b='Company Y' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(payment_amount) FROM SupplyChainPayments WHERE payment_date >= '2021-01-01' AND payment_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, payment_amount FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT party1_id, party2_id, payment_amount FROM smart_contracts WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_parties ORDER BY party_name DESC;
SELECT party_id, party_name, party_type FROM supply_chain_parties WHERE party_type = 'Supplier';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY contract_name ASC
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, payment_amount FROM smart_contracts WHERE payment_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC
SELECT contract_name, party1_id, party2_id FROM smart_contracts WHERE party1_id IS NOT NULL AND party2_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY contract_name ASC
SELECT sc.party_name, sc.party_type, s.payment_amount FROM supply_chain_parties sc JOIN smart_contracts s ON sc.party_id = s.party1_id ORDER BY s.payment_amount DESC
SELECT s.contract_id, s.contract_name, sc.party_name FROM smart_contracts s JOIN supply_chain_parties sc ON s.party2_id = sc.party_id ORDER BY sc.party_name ASC
SELECT * FROM parties;
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM parties WHERE party_type = 'Vendor';
SELECT party_id, party_name FROM parties ORDER BY party_name ASC;
SELECT contract_id, party1_id, party2_id, contract_status FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_status = 'Active';
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_status = 'Active';
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM parties ORDER BY party_name DESC;
SELECT contract_id, party1_id, party2_id, contract_status FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY contract_id ASC;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT party_name, party_type, contract_status FROM parties p JOIN smart_contracts sc ON p.party_id = sc.party1_id WHERE sc.contract_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_id, party_1, amount FROM smart_contracts WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT party_1, party_2, status FROM smart_contracts WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT party_name, address FROM parties WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT party_name, address FROM parties WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL AND party_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY party_id;
SELECT contract_id, party_1, party_2, amount FROM smart_contracts WHERE status = 'Active' AND amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT product_name, price*quantity AS total_price FROM products WHERE price <= 50 AND quantity > 5 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, contract_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE completed = FALSE ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, payment_amount, payment_status FROM smart_contracts WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM parties ORDER BY party_name ASC;
SELECT contract_id, payment_amount FROM transactions WHERE payment_amount >= 1000;
SELECT template_name, payment_amount, template_description FROM contract_templates WHERE payment_amount < 5000 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE payment_status = 'Completed';
SELECT contract_name, payment_amount FROM smart_contracts WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT party_name, party_type, party_address FROM parties WHERE party_type = 'Supplier';
SELECT contract_id, transaction_date, payment_status FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT template_name, payment_amount, template_description FROM contract_templates WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
